abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the installation
            of new generating, transmission and distribution facilities,
            as well as a program for rural electrification and the first
            stage in the conversion of the 50-cycle system in the Centro
            area to 60-cycle frequency. It will include completion of
            facilities under way and commencement of new ones. It is
            based on the long-range power sector expansion plan which is
            reviewed periodically by the Bank and by CFE's
            engineering consultants, SOFRELEC.
